text: Logo of the Superleague The 29th and final SPAR European Cup took place on 21 and 22 June 2008 at the Parc des Sports Stadium in Annecy, France. The Parc des Sports Annecy Stadium was also stadium for 1998 World Junior Championships in Athletics. It was the last edition of the European Cup which from 2009 has been replaced by European Team Championships combining the men and women competitions. ==Superleague== ===Final Standings=== ;Men {| League (16 teams, men and women, in two groups of equal level). ===Group A=== at Estádio Dr. Magalhães Pessoa, Leiria, (Portugal), on 21 & 22 June 2008. ;Men's: was relegated into League 1 from Superleague 2007 and & are promoted into the 1st League from 2007 2nd League for 2008 European Cup. ;Women's: was relegated into League 1 from Superleague 2007 and & are promoted into the 1st League
